description: The 20-year-old broke out of the SoundCloud rap scene and reached No 1. But he faced accusations of violent crimes against a woman, and leaves behind a troubling legacy.
title: XXXTentacion, Mourning and Morality
title_page: XXXTentacion, Mourning and Morality - The New York Times
text:
The Popcast is hosted by Jon Caramanica, a pop music critic for The New York Times. It covers the latest in pop music criticism, trends and news.
The rapper and singer XXXTentacion was shot and killed this week. He was 20 years old. His career, while short, was potent, earning him millions of fans. And he left a troubling legacy â€” he was accused of violent crimes against a former girlfriend.
